title: Family Beachside Apartment Stay in Kingscliff
description: Embrace a peaceful beachside escape for the whole family in the sunny seaside town of Kingscliff. Located on the coast of the Northern Rivers region, Kingscliff is the perfect place for a laidback getaway staying in Paradiso Resort Kingscliff. Offering the ultimate in self-contained apartment living, you will feel like you’ve found your coastal home-away-from-home at this stylish resort, boasting an enviable beachside location so you’re within easy reach of all this beautiful town has to offer. Embark on a family or group getaway with a welcome bottle of wine and guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Stylish Beachside Group Escape Near the Gold Coast and Byron Bay
description: Take a trip to the popular beach destination of Kingscliff on the New South Wales North Coast with a beach house stay for up to 10 people. Stay in a luxury beach house and enjoy spacious indoor/outdoor entertainment with stunning, modern living areas and easy access to the white sands of Kingscliff in Tweed Heads, the Gold Coast and Byron Bay. Includes a bottle of wine on arrival and half-day hire of paddleboards, kayaks and snorkelling equipment from Sunrise Cove.

title: Signature Indulgence at Peppers Salt Resort & Spa in Kingscliff
description:
Treat yourself to a laid-back escape in signature Peppers luxury and embrace the coastal atmosphere of the NSW Tweed Coast at Peppers Salt Resort & Spa Kingscliff, located minutes from Kingscliff’s spectacular beachfront, just 20 minutes from Gold Coast Airport and 45 minutes from Byron Bay.

Relax and unwind at this acclaimed resort and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink each (your choice of a glass of wine, beer or house spirit), two hours of bike hire per stay to explore hidden beaches and local markets, complimentary in-room movies, Wi-Fi and a 15% dining discount at the award-winning Season Restaurant.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).

title: Boutique Apartment Stay on New South Wales' North Coast
description: Discover a slice of paradise on the sparkling north coast of New South Wales at the Oaks Santai Resort Casuarina - a stylish beach sanctuary in Kingscliff, between the Gold Coast and Byron Bay. Indulge in a relaxing beach escape in a boutique Studio Apartment including daily cooked breakfast at the nearby The Bakers Café, a welcome bottle of wine, complimentary Wi-Fi and guaranteed late 12 noon checkout.

title: Signature Peppers Indulgence in Kingscliff
description: Discover a slice of paradise on the Tweed Coast at Peppers Salt Resort & Spa, located minutes from Kingscliff’s spectacular beachfront, between Byron Bay and the Gold Coast. Stay three nights and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a beer, wine or house spirit each, two hours of bike hire to explore hidden beaches and local markets, in-room movies, Wi-Fi and dining discounts at the award-winning Season Restaurant for two.

title: Romantic Beachside Escape at Santai Retreat
description: Unwind with a relaxing beach getaway at Santai Retreat in Kingscliff. Stay three nights and enjoy a bottle of wine and chocolates on arrival, spa credits, unlimited in-room movies, late checkout, complimentary yoga, discounts to local cafes and attractions, and much more for two.

title: Best-Selling Peppers Salt Resort & Spa in Kingscliff with Daily Breakfast
description:
Treat yourself to a well-deserved escape in paradise and embrace the relaxed coastal atmosphere of the Tweed Coast at the highly sought-after Peppers Salt Resort & Spa Kingscliff, just 20 minutes from Gold Coast Airport and 45 minutes from Byron Bay. This top-selling Kingscliff resort is one of New South Wales' best-kept secrets, sitting moments from the powdery beachfront, and providing a family-friendly launchpad to explore this enchanting corner of Australia.

Every detail has been considered to ensure a memorable stay, including the perfectly appointed rooms complete with modern furnishings and stylish fittings, exceptional culinary delights, lagoon-themed swimming pool complete with its own sandy beach, The Spa at Salt and lush subtropical gardens that frame the resort. When you're not relaxing onsite, the resort's enviable location means you'll be perfectly positioned to make the most of the area's many attractions, such as boutiques, beachfront bars and trails, or embark on short day trips to the relaxing streets of Byron Bay, the breathtaking shores of Casuarina or the glittering sights of the Gold Coast.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with chef-served breakfast featuring all-time favourites
- Arrive to one welcome drink per person (beer, wine or house spirit) to celebrate your stay
- Enjoy a one-time 15% discount on dining at Peppers Resort & Spa (Tuesday-Saturday only)
- Complimentary two-hour bike hire to explore local sights and hidden beaches
- Stay connected with in-room Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family or friends?** Choose the Two-Bedroom Spa Suite and enjoy more room to move, private balcony, laundry facilities and more.

title: Stylish Beachside Group Escape near Byron Bay for up to 8 Guests with Private Pool
description:
Take a sun-kissed break in the glorious beach destination of Kingscliff, on the New South Wales North Coast, with a stay at Kingscliff Bliss - an ultra-modern beachfront home perfect for up to eight guests.  

This exquisite property boasts an enviable location in NSW's popular Kingscliff and places you just 50 minutes north of Byron Bay and a 20-minute drive from Gold Coast Airport - making it the ideal base to discover the region. No matter which direction you head from your boutique home, you’ll find plenty of spectacular beaches, blissful coastal towns and lush national parks to explore. 

Whether you are travelling as a group of friends or with family, this spacious beach house allows for independence and luxury, with an ideal location just steps from the beach.

title: Stylish Four-Bedroom Beach House Close to Byron Bay and the Gold Coast
description: Relax in ultimate luxury with a beachside escape for the whole family or a group of friends at Angourie Beach House - perched on the border between sunkissed Queensland and New South Wales, just ten minutes from Tweed Heads, half an hour from Byron Bay and less than an hour from the iconic Gold Coast. Surrender to the laidback charms of northern NSW with three nights in a chic and modern Beach House for four adults and four children with a bottle of wine on arrival and a half-day of equipment hire from Sunrise Cove, including paddleboards, kayaks and snorkelling gear.

title: Signature Indulgence at Peppers Salt Resort & Spa in Kingscliff
description: Discover a slice of paradise on the Tweed Coast at Peppers Salt Resort & Spa, located minutes from Kingscliff’s spectacular beachfront, between Byron Bay and the Gold Coast. Stay three nights and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts a beer, wine or house spirit each, two hours of bike hire per stay to explore hidden beaches and local markets, in-room movies, Wi-Fi, and a 15% dining discount at the award-winning Season Restaurant for two.

title: Beachside Group Villa for 7 Guests near the Gold Coast & Byron Bay
description: Surrender to the laidback charms of Kingscliff on the New South Wales North Coast with a villa retreat for seven people. Relax in ultimate luxury with the whole family or a group of friends, staying in one of two Dreamtime Villas - stunning three-bedroom villas perched on the border between sunkissed Queensland and New South Wales. Stay just a short walk from sandy Kingscliff Beach, just ten minutes' drive from Tweed Heads, half an hour by car from Byron Bay and less than an hour's drive from the iconic Gold Coast.

title: Beachside Group Villa Escape Near Gold Coast & Byron Bay
description: Take a trip to the popular beach destination of Kingscliff on the New South Wales North Coast with a villa stay for eight, 10 or 12 people. Choose a luxury beach house to suit your needs and enjoy spacious indoor/outdoor entertainment and stunning, modern living areas with easy access to the white sands of Kingscliff in Tweed Heads, a 20-minute drive from the Gold Coast and 50 minutes’ drive north of Byron Bay. Includes a bottle of wine on arrival and half-day hire of paddle boards, kayaks and snorkelling equipment from Sunrise Cove.

title: Coastal Kingscliff Escape 20 Minutes from Tweed Heads with Pools, Restaurant & Tennis Courts
description: For all the charm of a seaside village combined with the luxury of one of Australia's leading resort brands, enjoy a stay at Peppers Salt Resort & Spa Kingscliff. Just minutes from the pristine Salt Beach and surrounded by lush hinterland, choose to laze the day away along the shore, in the resort's sparkling pool, or enjoy a friendly hit of tennis. Savour locally-sourced cuisine at the onsite Season restaurant, rejuvenate at the world-class Spa At Salt, or explore the nearby boutique shops and cafes.

title: NSW Tweed Coast Mantra Beachside Escape Just 30 Minutes from Byron Bay with Lagoon-Style Pool
description: This is your invitation to discover one of the region's best-kept secrets: embrace surfside serenity with a family-friendly beachside stay located on New South Wales' spectacular Tweed Coast, just 30 minutes from Byron Bay. Mantra on Salt Beach Kingscliff occupies a prime position in Salt Village - the charming coastal town of Kingscliff's retail and dining precinct - and with direct access to Salt Beach's balmy sands, you'll be all set to enjoy the good life.
offer_address: Gunnamatta Avenue, Kingscliff, New South Wales 2847, Australia
